content.rendered:
Kate Morris

OFFICE MANAGER

CREDENTIALS
  • Level 3 Excel Certified
  • Doula
  • CNA
  • Certified Employee Relations & Employee Life Cycle
  • Certified Organizational Ethics with Mirco HR
PROFESSIONAL

Kate has worked at Bridge House as a medical technician, floor manager, Aegis instructor, and human resource assistant. Through these many roles, she has learned a lot about the Bridge House process. She understands the importance of intentional relationship building and doing so in a way that best supports the growth of those we care for here. Through her years of working here at Bridge House, she has seen its positive impact on so many individuals who felt they had no other options left.

PERSONAL

Kate loves the outdoors. She can be found hiking and camping around Utah and exploring national parks with her family. Outdoor concerts are a weekly part of her summer evenings, where she can get out and listen to live music. She was born and raised in Utah and currently resides in Davis County. She enjoys supporting and teaching women through the phases of pregnancy and postpartum and works as a Doula in her spare time.

HOPE, HEALTH & HEALING

Kate believes that hope, health, and healing are essential keys to moving through life on your best path. Life can get messy, but with these key elements, it can all seem a bit more manageable to keep striving for the best version of yourself.

Working in Mental Health since 2018

Working at Bridge House since 2018
